en.today: The day gets off to a rocky start, dear Aries, as the Aquarius moon forms tense aspects with Mars and Mercury. Pace yourself to avoid miscommunications and mistakes, and try to steer clear of drama. A desire for independence may also cause you to shirk certain responsibilities, and it'll be important that you maintain a responsible agenda. Reach out for support from your community if further motivation is needed. The energy elevates when Chiron stirs, helping you find your place within society. Share your ideas publicly or invest in furthering your education when Luna and Jupiter align later tonight.

en.today: Ease into the work week and leave plenty of room for soft moments, dearest Leo. As the Aquarius moon forms tense aspects with Mars and Mercury early this morning, you'll struggle to stay on track if personal balance isn't a priority. Don't hesitate to lean on the support loved ones offer if you start to feel adrift. Your mood elevates as the hours pass, and connecting with others will sharpen your mind. Healing vibes flow when Luna aspects Chiron and Jupiter later tonight, inspiring you to create magical moments within your community or while laying low with that special someone.

en.today: The Aquarius moon forms harsh connections with Mars and Mercury this morning, dear Taurus, bringing unpredictable and challenging energy to the table. Focus on keeping your thoughts in order by setting boundaries and leaning into personal structures that offer stability. You'll feel more in control and resilient as the hours pass and will accomplish much when clear-cut goals are set. Spend some time reflecting on your relationship with success when Chiron stirs, feeling proud of your accomplishments thus far. Nurture existing goals when Luna and Jupiter align later tonight, and significant rewards are sure to follow.

en.today: The universe showers you with messages from beyond this morning, dear Gemini, as the Aquarius moon aspects Mars and Mercury. Relish synchronicities and magical moments, but try not to overanalyze what it all means. Clarity will find its way to you as the hours pass, especially when you embrace meditation and mindfulness. Now is also an ideal time to set goals and ask for divine guidance. You'll find healing through your community when love and inclusion are made a priority, thanks to sweet aspects between Luna and Chiron later tonight. Meanwhile, Jupiter stirs in your sign, increasing charisma and popularity.
